description: Prevents your AI from breaking code by revealing hidden file dependencies through git forensics.

driftDays.description: Days before a coupled file is considered stale

analysisWindow.description: Number of commits to analyze for coupling

capabilities.name: analyze_file
capabilities.description: Returns forensic history, hidden dependencies, and risk assessment. USE THIS before modifying files.

capabilities.name: ask_history
capabilities.description: Search git history for WHY code was written. IMPORTANT: Use SHORT, SPECIFIC KEYWORDS (e.g., 'serialization', 'race condition', 'timeout'). Do NOT use full sentences or long descriptions - they will return 0 results. Use when asking 'why does this exist?' or before removing code.
